title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions:
**Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 Gallon, Black**

Elevate the comfort of your living space with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. This stylish black humidifier is designed to improve air quality and moisture levels in rooms up to 320 square feet, making it ideal for medium-sized living areas, bedrooms, or offices.

**Key Features:**

- **1 Gallon Tank Capacity**: This humidifier features a large 1-gallon water tank, ensuring long-lasting mist output without the need for frequent refills.
  
- **Cool Mist Evaporative Technology**: Experience the benefits of cool mist evaporative technology, which provides a comfortable and safe humidity level without the risk of hot steam.

- **Low Tank Indicator**: Never worry about running dry! The built-in low tank indicator will alert you when it's time to refill.

- **Dishwasher Safe**: Cleaning is a breeze thanks to dishwasher-safe parts, making maintenance simple and hassle-free.

- **Humidity Capacity**: It efficiently emits 142 milliliters of moisture per hour, helping to alleviate dry air discomfort.

- **Aroma Tray**: Add a touch of fragrance to your environment with the convenient aroma tray, designed for use with your favorite essential oils.

- **Three Speed Settings**: Customize your comfort with three different speed settings, easily adjusted by a user-friendly mechanical knob.

- **Coverage Area**: Optimally designed to cover an area of up to 320 square feet, perfect for a variety of room sizes.

- **Lightweight Design**: Weighing in at only 6.33 pounds, this humidifier is easy to move and reposition as needed.

- **Replacement Filter Compatibility**: Ensuring clean mist, this humidifier is compatible with the BestAir H62 replacement filter.

- **Empty Tank Protection**: To protect the unit and ensure durability, the humidifier features an automatic shut-off when the tank is empty.

**Add the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier to your home for improved air quality and comfort. Its sleek black design and efficient performance make it a must-have for anyone seeking a healthier living environment.**

**Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 Gallon, Black**

Elevate the comfort of your home environment with the sleek and efficient Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier. Designed to blend seamlessly into any room with its elegant black finish, this humidifier not only improves air quality but also adds a touch of sophistication to your decor.

**Key Features:**

- **1 Gallon Tank Capacity:** Enjoy long-lasting humidity without frequent refills.

- **Low Tank Indicator:** Always stay informed with a handy indicator that alerts you when it's time to refill.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Cleaning is a breeze with dishwasher-safe components, ensuring a hygienic humidifying experience.
- **Humidity Output:** With a capacity of 142ml per hour, maintain optimal humidity levels effortlessly.
- **Aroma Tray:** Add your favorite essential oils to the aroma tray to infuse your space with relaxing or invigorating scents.
- **Three Speed Settings:** Customize your comfort with three adjustable speed settings, controlled by an easy-to-use mechanical knob.
- **Coverage Area:** Efficiently humidify spaces up to 320 square feet, making it ideal for medium-sized rooms.
- **Lightweight Design:** Weighing just 6.33 lbs, this humidifier is easy to move and position wherever you need it.
- **Replacement Filter:** Compatible with BestAir H62 filters to ensure your air stays clean and fresh.
- **Empty Tank Protection:** Automatically shuts off to prevent damage and conserve energy when the tank is empty.
- **Evaporative Technology:** Enjoy a natural humidifying process that filters out minerals and impurities from the water.

Whether you're looking to alleviate dry skin, soothe allergies, or simply create a more comfortable living space, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is your solution for maintaining a balanced and pleasant indoor atmosphere. Add it to your home today and breathe easier tomorrow!

### Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 Gallon, Black

- **Low Tank Indicator:** Never worry about running dry, as the low tank indicator alerts you when it's time for a refill.
- **Dishwasher Safe:** Maintenance is a breeze as the humidifier components are dishwasher safe, ensuring easy cleaning.

- **Aroma Tray:** Add your favorite essential oils to the aroma tray to infuse your room with relaxing or invigorating scents.
- **Adjustable Speed Settings:** Tailor your comfort with 3 different speed settings, all controlled by a simple mechanical knob.
- **Ample Coverage:** Ideal for rooms up to 320 square feet, this humidifier ensures even distribution throughout your space.
- **Lightweight Design:** At just 6.33 pounds, it's easy to move from room to room or store when not in use.
- **Replacement Filter Compatibility:** Use with BestAir H62 replacement filters to keep your humidifier running smoothly.
- **Empty Tank Protection:** The humidifier automatically shuts off when the tank is empty, which prolongs the life of the unit and ensures safety.

Whether you're looking to combat the dry winter air, alleviate allergy symptoms, or simply create a more comfortable living space, the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier is the perfect solution. Its modern black design fits seamlessly into any decor, making it an attractive and practical addition to your home or office.
